participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Relaxed and nurturing, enjoys self-care and spending time with her pets.
participant_1.background: i love taking bubble baths. i'm single and with two dogs. i do not drink alcohol. i'm in my thirties.

participant_2.name: Jack
participant_2.personality: Caring and reflective, values community service and has a passion for history.
participant_2.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i am a retired gym teacher. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries.

content.text: i love bubble baths, what do you do? i'm single.
